item.title: Command not working
item.dc:creator: @goudont goudont
item.description:
@goudont wrote:

if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("claim")) { if (System.currentTimeMillis() < 86400000) { sendMessage("It has not been 24 hours yet!"); return; } else if (System.currentTimeMillis() >= 86400000) { player.getInventory().addItem(995, 3000000); sendMessage("noob."); }

That should work.

Read full topic

make sure it declared in player.java? I need help doing this then.

Read full topic

item.title: Command not working
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

You could use something like…

if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("claim")) {
   if (System.currentTimeMillis() - waitTime > TIME_TO_WAIT) {
      player.getInventory().addItem(995, 3000000);
      waitTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
   } else {
      sendMessage("It hasn't been 24 hours");
   }

You’ll have to make sure the variable waitTime is declared.

Read full topic

item.title: Command not working
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

ther3aper:

That does not work, It lets me do it unlimited times in my server.

Try this one instead.

if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("claim")) {
   if (System.currentTimeMillis() < 86400000) {
      sendMessage("It has not been 24 hours yet!");
      return;
   } else {
      player.getInventory().addItem(995, 3000000);
   }
}

Read full topic

item.title: Command not working
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:2, topic:480477”][quote author=ther3aper link=topic=598710.msg4210075#msg4210075 date=1359413045]
I have this as a command setup so they can only do claim every 24 hours but it doesn’t work? I am hosting a 714

if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase(“claim”)) {
player.getInventory().addItem(995, 3000000);
if(System.currentTimeMillis() > 86400000) {
sendMessage(“It has not been 24 hours yet!”);
}

[/quote]
Why are you handling that through a command? The MySQL should do the check for you… and send results to the server.[/quote]

Maybe it’s just a command to add cash every 24 hours ._.

Read full topic
